General.Name: Chateau International Development Co Ltd
General.Description: Chateau International Development Co., Ltd. engages in the operation of amusement areas, hotels, and restaurants in Taiwan. It operates hotels under the Kenting Chateau Beach Resort, Chateau Hotel Anping, and Chateau Fulang Hotel names. The company was incorporated in 1995 and is headquartered in Pingtung, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 15, Huancheng North Road, Pingtung, Taiwan, 94643
